attributes.action: stop taking motability cars away from disabled people
attributes.additional_details: motability are taking cars from disabled people who are having theyre benefits stopped due to their "random review process" and if the disabled person does not tick all the right boxes they have to go to appeal and even tribunal to fight to get the benefits back which causes severe stress and hardship surely it is everyones human right to be able to go out and about go shopping and have a social life and not be left housebound when there are people who get disability for being "recovering drug or alcohol abusers or just cant speak english " and genuinely disabled people are having their benefits cut surely this is wrong please join me in bringing this to the goverments attention a goverment that says they care
